description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Plum Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Stone fruit,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Grilled Plum Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine salad leaves in a bowl with radishes.
Preheat a chargrill over medium heat. Cut each plum half into 3 wedges. Chargrill plums and fennel for 1 minute each side until tender. Transfer to a plate.
Increase heat to medium-high. Season pork cutlets and cook for 4-5 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking.
For the dressing, whisk vinegar, maple syrup and mustard together. Gradually add oil, and whisk until creamy. Drizzle over salad. Scatter with pecans and serve with cutlets.
